tool_description: IP Geolocation API for City, Country, Currency, Languages, Timezone, and Maps
name: IP Location
title: IP Location

api_list.name: getLocationByIP
api_list.description: Use this API for mapping an IPv4 or IPv6 address to city name.

required_parameters.name: IP
required_parameters.description: An IP address. Try 202.94.72.116, or just 'auto' for IP auto-detection.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastah-ip.p.rapidapi.com/whereis/v1/json/auto"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastah-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fastah-ip.p.rapidapi.com/whereis/v1/json/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastah-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
